$
$
Support Urbanite Theatre
with a gift to our Second Act campaign
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Donate Now
/$
$
‚Äã
Small stages demand extraordinary effort‚Äîand Urbanite Theatre delivers!
As we enter our 12th season in 2025, Urbanite continues to thrive by creating intimate, unforgettable performances that connect artists and audiences in bold, meaningful ways. With only 65 seats and an unwavering commitment to new work, our impact far exceeds our size.
We're proud to continue our
SECOND ACT CAMPAIGN
, with a goal of raising
$550,000 for the 2025‚Äì2026 fiscal
year
.
These funds are more essential than ever, especially in light of significant reductions in grant funding this season. Ticket sales alone can't cover the true cost of producing powerful, cutting-edge theatre. From renting our performance space and offices to housing artists and supporting production teams, every dollar directly helps us bring world-class artistry to Sarasota.
Your support ensures that bold storytelling remains a vibrant part of our community and helps us write the next act!
‚Äã
Where Your Donation Goes:
‚Äã
üé≠
Artistic Talent:
Supporting non-union and equity actors, directors, designers, and creative staff.
üè¢
Spaces to Create:
Covering rent for our theater, office, rehearsal, and warehouse spaces.
üè†
Artist Housing:
Providing accommodations for visiting artists.
üíº
Administrative Essentials:
Keeping our full-time staff and behind-the-scenes operations running smoothly.
Your contribution ensures Urbanite Theatre can continue producing bold, challenging, and community-building theater for years to come. Together, we‚Äôll secure a lasting legacy for live theater in Sarasota.
With your help, we can ensure that our second act is our boldest one yet.
Urbanite Theatre is a 501(c)3 non-profit , and your tax-deductible support is crucial to our ability to bring quality productions to the area, excite new theatergoers, and employ professional artists from around the country.
‚Äã
Consider making your gift a recurring donation!
/$
$
Donate Now
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Learn More About Urbanite
/$
$
Check out our Giving Partner Profile!
/$
$
Our Profile
/$
/$
$
$
Every gift matters. Learn more about your benefits as a donor below.
/$
/$
$
$
Producing Partner ($50,000+)
Your Name listed as an Producing Partner Producer for the entire season (or 1 year from gift), along with recognition on two productions of your choice.
Four Flex Passes (16 tickets) to use at your discretion.
Digital Slide in the program to use at your discretion.
Dedicated Social Media and newsletter feature.
Customizable options available upon request.
All benefits of lower tiers.
Presenting Producer ($20,000-$49,999)
Your Name listed as an Executive Producer for the entire season (or 1 year from gift), along with assignment to 1 specific production of your choice.
Invitation to (1) pre-production meeting.
Presenting Producer Flex Pass (10 tickets) to use at your discretion.
Invitation & Guaranteed Reserved seating to all Urbanite Special Events.
(1) cocktail + dinner party for you and your friends hosted by the Producing Artistic Director and Urbanite Team.
Urbanite Swag (‚ÄúUrbanite Producer‚Äù hoodie).
Customizable options available upon request.
All benefits of lower tiers.
Executive Producer ($10,000-$19,999)
Your Name listed as an Executive Producer for the entire season (or 1 year from gift), along with assignment to 1 specific production of your choice.
Invitation to First Read & Final Dress rehearsals to ALL productions.
Executive Producer Flex Pass (8 tickets) to use at your discretion.
Invitation & Guaranteed Reserved seating to all Urbanite Special Events.
One private dinner hosted by the Producing Artistic Director and Urbanite Team.
Private and Exclusive Behind-the-Scenes Tour of Urbanite Facilities for (4).
All benefits of lower tiers.
Co-Producer ($5,000-$9,999)
Your Name listed as a Co-Producer for the entire season (or 1 year from gift), along with assignment to 1 specific production of your choice.
Invitation to First Read & Final Dress rehearsals to (1) assigned show.
Co-Producer Flex Pass (4 tickets) to use at your discretion.
Guaranteed Reserved Seating for all productions.
One pre-show wine and cheese night hosted by the Producing Artistic Director and Urbanite Team.
All benefits of lower tiers.
Associate Producer ($2,500-$4,999)
Your Name listed as an Associate Producer for the entire season (or 1 year from gift), along with assignment to 1 specific production of your choice.
Your Name in acknowledged in lobby display posters.
Invitation to a private (pre-public) Season Announcement Party + Special verbal acknowledgement of you and your contribution at the event.
(1) Social Media ‚ÄúMeet the Producers‚Äù post acknowledging donation and celebrating you as Urbanite‚Äôs latest producer on Urbanite‚Äôs Instagram & Facebook.
Invitation to Final Dress rehearsal to (1) assigned show.
Associate Producer Flex Pass (2 tickets) to use at your discretion.
Invitation to the EXCLUSIVE Producer‚Äôs ONLY Circle Party.
Urbanite Swag (‚ÄúUrbanite Producer‚Äù pin and hat).
All benefits of lower tiers.
City Council ($1,000-$2,499)
Invitation to a First-Read of a Season Play.
Your Name listed in digital program under ‚ÄúCity Council.‚Äù
All benefits of lower tiers.
Neighborhood Watch ($500-$999)
2 Tickets to our EXCLUSIVE Annual Donor Appreciation Brunch.
Your Name listed in digital program under ‚ÄúNeighborhood Watch.‚Äù
All benefits of lower tiers.
Lifeguard ($100-499)
Urbanite Swag (‚ÄúUrbanite Donor‚Äù pin)
Your Name listed on the supporters section of our website under 2025-2026 season or for one fiscal year from the date of your gift.
Townspeople (Under $100)
Your Name listed on the supporters section of our website under 2025-2026 season or for one fiscal year from the date of your gift.
/$
$
Donate Now
/$
$
Other ways to support
/$
$
Whether its donating stocks, securities, a legacy gift, a bequest through your will, charitable transfers from your IRA, or honoring the life of a special person, there are a variety of ways to support Urbanite Theatre in alternate ways.
‚Äã
If any of these types of support are appealing to you, contact us today by calling¬† 941-321-1397 or email Summer at
info@urbanitetheatre.com
‚Äã
Urbanite Theatre is pleased to announce a partnership with Stock Donator, a service that allows donors to conveniently and securely donate stocks to Urbanite Theatre. Click the button below to get started.
‚Äã
/$
$
/$
$
‚Äã
‚Äã
‚Äã
UR
BANITE THEATRE IS A 501(c) (3) NONPROFIT REGISTERED WITH THE FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE & CONSUMER SERVICES; REGISTRATION NUMBER -CH41151. ¬†A COPY OF THE OFFICIAL REGISTRATION AND FINANCIAL INFORMATION MAY BE OBTAINED FROM THE DIVISION OF CONSUMER SERVICES BY CALLING TOLL-FREE (800-435-7352) WITHIN THE STATE. REGISTRATION DOES NOT IMPLY ENDORSEMENT, APPROVAL, OR RECOMMENDATION BY THE STATE.
‚Äã

$
MISSION
/$
$
Urbanite Theatre is committed to creating visceral, shared experiences by fearlessly lifting up the boldest new voices in theatre. We believe in inclusive, artist-first storytelling, daring honesty, and the powerful connectivity of an intimate space.
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
DIVERSITY & INCLUSION
/$
/$
$
$
Urbanite Theatre strongly believes that an effective workforce includes employees from different and diverse backgrounds and experiences that together form a more creative, innovative, and productive environment.
Urbanite Theatre recognizes that building an equitable, anti-racist, and inclusive environment is the key ingredient to its relevance and sustainability in the community. Urbanite Theatre respects diversity within human qualities and these qualities include but are not limited to: ethnicity, race, color, country of origin, sex, gender, age, sexual orientation, marital status, religion, beliefs, political affiliations, socioeconomic status, experiences and any form of disability.
Urbanite Theatre strives to create a culture of inclusion where employees of diverse human qualities can thrive and succeed and are able to participate in, and contribute to, the progress and success of the theatre while growing both professionally and personally.
‚Äã
Discrimination of any kind will not be tolerated in Urbanite Theatre, and any reported instances will be grounds for immediate refusal of service.
‚Äã
At Urbanite Theatre, we believe in radical acceptance, relentless inclusion, and the unwavering support of vulnerable communities.
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
LAND ACKNOWLEDGMENT
‚Äã
Urbanite Theatre
would like to acknowledge the indigenous communities native to this region by recognizing that we gather today on the unceded ancestral land of the Calusa and Seminole people, past and present. We honor
with gratitude the land itself and the people who have stewarded it throughout the generations.

‚Äã
Small stages demand extraordinary effort‚Äîand Urbanite Theatre delivers!
As we enter our 12th season in 2025, Urbanite continues to thrive by creating intimate, unforgettable performances that connect artists and audiences in bold, meaningful ways. With only 65 seats and an unwavering commitment to new work, our impact far exceeds our size.
We're proud to continue our
SECOND ACT CAMPAIGN
, with a goal of raising
$550,000 for the 2025‚Äì2026 fiscal
year
.
These funds are more essential than ever, especially in light of significant reductions in grant funding this season. Ticket sales alone can't cover the true cost of producing powerful, cutting-edge theatre. From renting our performance space and offices to housing artists and supporting production teams, every dollar directly helps us bring world-class artistry to Sarasota.
Your support ensures that bold storytelling remains a vibrant part of our community and helps us write the next act!
‚Äã
Where Your Donation Goes:
‚Äã
üé≠
Artistic Talent:
Supporting non-union and equity actors, directors, designers, and creative staff.
üè¢
Spaces to Create:
Covering rent for our theater, office, rehearsal, and warehouse spaces.
üè†
Artist Housing:
Providing accommodations for visiting artists.
üíº
Administrative Essentials:
Keeping our full-time staff and behind-the-scenes operations running smoothly.
Your contribution ensures Urbanite Theatre can continue producing bold, challenging, and community-building theater for years to come. Together, we‚Äôll secure a lasting legacy for live theater in Sarasota.
With your help, we can ensure that our second act is our boldest one yet.
Urbanite Theatre is a 501(c)3 non-profit , and your tax-deductible support is crucial to our ability to bring quality productions to the area, excite new theatergoers, and employ professional artists from around the country.
‚Äã
Consider making your gift a recurring donation!
